member.name: F:MacroFramework.Commands.BindSettings.Default
member.summary: The default settings for a bind. Sufficient for the majority of binds. Only the defined keys can be pressed and in order. Activated when the last key of the bind is released.

member.name: F:MacroFramework.Commands.BindSettings.OnFirstReleaseUnordered
member.summary: Only the defined keys can be pressed in any order. Activated when the last key of the bind is released.

member.name: F:MacroFramework.Commands.BindSettings.OnPress
member.summary: Only the defined keys can be pressed and in order. Activated when the last key of the bind is pressed down.

member.name: F:MacroFramework.Commands.BindSettings.OnPressUnordered
member.summary: Only the defined keys can be pressed and in order. Activated when the last key of the bind is pressed down.

member.name: T:MacroFramework.Commands.ActivationEventType
member.summary: Filters activations based on whether the current event was a keydown or a keyup event
member.remarks: You should be fine with most of the time.

member.name: F:MacroFramework.Commands.ActivationEventType.OnFirstRelease
member.summary: Only activates a keybind on the first key release after a keypress. E.g. if you press [A, B, C] and release the keys in order, only the binds with [A, B, C] will be activated.

member.name: F:MacroFramework.Commands.ActivationEventType.OnAnyRelease
member.summary: Activates a keybind on any key up event. E.g. if you press [A, B, C] and release the keys in order, the binds for [A, B, C], [B, C] and [C] will be activated.

member.name: F:MacroFramework.Commands.ActivationEventType.OnPress
member.summary: Activates a keybind on any key down event. E.g. if you press and hold [A, B, C] in order, the binds with [A], [A, B] and [A, B, C] will be activated.

member.name: F:MacroFramework.Commands.ActivationEventType.Any
member.summary: ACtivates a keybind on any key event. Use with caution as binds with this option are activated twice, once on key down and once again on key up events. Use to determine whether the current event is a key down or up event.

member.name: T:MacroFramework.Commands.KeyMatchType
member.summary: Determines how keypress combinations are checked for matches

member.name: F:MacroFramework.Commands.KeyMatchType.ExactKeyMatch
member.summary: Match occurs if all of the selected keys and no other keys are pressed

member.name: F:MacroFramework.Commands.KeyMatchType.PartialMatch
member.summary: Match occurs if all of the selected keys are pressed

member.name: T:MacroFramework.Commands.KeyPressOrder
member.summary: Determines whether keys should be pressed in the give parameter order

member.name: F:MacroFramework.Commands.KeyPressOrder.Ordered
member.summary: The will only activate if are pressed in order

member.name: F:MacroFramework.Commands.KeyPressOrder.Unordered
member.summary: The will activate if are pressed in any order
